title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: FincUngthat Douglas did not come so quickly as heexpected, he again hurried up the stair tosee what was the cause of delay, and thenhe made off across the park to a corner ofthe Links, where, leaping the waU, hespeedily gained Wright's Houses, andmade the best of his way to Castle Barns,and thence back to Ponton Street, wherehe found SaUy M'Dougal, his paramour ;and sending for some whisky, he spent twohours in drinking and chatting, telling onlyso much of the child's history as he deemed
